From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

Read more

The part 2 of the round hose is already attached to the round hose-Version 2

If you need to switch, you need to remove the part 2 and all flat hose, and then connect the Version 2

item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:05:37 UTC – Details)



UNIVERSAL FIT KIT – A total of 620pcs push rivets including 16 most popular car clip fastener kits, suitable for OEM replacement of 6-10mm hole size. Don’t worry about lost or damaged body fasteners. All the necessary retainers for exact replacement of the old and broken retainer.
IMPACT RESISTANT CAR CLIPS – It’s made of durable nylon fiber material, not easy to break or deform. Excellent workmanship is necessary to condition for product reliability, stability, and long-term use, We check the products again before shipping for you.
TOUGH FASTENER REMOVER TOOLS – 1 Fastener remover and 4 different size car panel removers made of Durable Plastic and Metal material, allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panels and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Easy access into confined areas.
EASY TO USE – Push in type, Just fix it to its mounting point and you’re done, Rivet post pressure expands legs for fast and tight fastening. Simple to install without complicated installation steps. Widely used in car panel, door trim, bumper and fender for GM Ford Toyota Honda Chrysler etc.
PACKAGE LIST – The auto body clip kit includes 620 Pcs bumper retainer clips, 1 plastic box, 5 durable fastener removal tools, 10 plastic cable ties. It allows to freely DIY your vehicle accessories at anytime you wanted. It is definitely cheaper than going to the auto parts store.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:20 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Analan Mini Pet Hair Remover

How did we get our start?

It took us about 7 months to prepare, from the function of using the product, to the shape design, size, and material, we kept researching and also registered several patents until ANALAN was born.

What have we been doing?

We have now completed the 2.0 version of the upgrade! We have upgraded the material of the blade to meet the requirements of frequent use.

What makes our products unique?

We value customer’s opinion! When testing the new materials for version 2.0, over 100 professional cosmetologists helped us test nearly 150 different formulations of rubber materials!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 4.72 x 0.78 inches; 4.59 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ANALAN-A
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 17, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Analan
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FH9GVW2

Get embedded fur out: Three levels of edges correspond to three different cleaning modes, making it easy and fast to get embedded fur out of couch, carpet, bed. Works well on cleaning hair from dogs like Huskies, Akita, Retriever, Labs, Corgis, Great Danes, and Mutts & kitty cats and other pets.
Comfortable in hand: A unique ergonomic grip design of the pet hair remover brush can help you remove pet hair from different angles without cramming your hands. Briskly sweep and drag pet hair into a pile, then vacuum it all.
Affordable and light weight. Durable, replaceable blades with a free rubber cord or two hooks (new and old packaging issued randomly) for easy carrying
Must-have for pet lovers: Send it as a gift to your friends who have pets but tired of pet hair removal at home or on the car seat. Let Analan remove the boundary of love and you can simply enjoy the time with furry friends!

ANALAN MINI PET HAIR REMOVER Version 2.0 Pro

We updated our new packaging, old and new packaging randomly issued. Please ask us anything you want to know before ordering!

Thank you very much for choosing our ANALAN MINI PET HAIR REMOVER~

  1. We think our product is not perfect, there are still many places to improve! We accept any criticism and suggestions with an open mind, and we want to get your real user feedback!
  2. If the product or color sent to you by Amazon warehouse is wrong, please tell us and help you replace it!

  • Great for removing hair from carpets, fabric sofas, bed furniture surfaces or corners stained by cute cats and dogs without worrying about scratching the surface~

Read more

Version 2.0 Update

Comfortable grip design

The triangular pet hair remover with ring-shaped handle (universal size for everyone) makes it very easy to grip and your hands won’t feel sore after long hours of use.

A matte, granular, non-slip coating is used on the ring-shaped handle. Even if your hands get wet, you still don’t have to worry about the pet hair remover slipping or sliding around.

Special groove design

Unlike the smooth scraping surface design on the market, the rubber groove design allows for faster and more efficient cleaning. The soft silicone and rubber groove design helps to firmly grip pet hair, which can create more friction to catch more fur and fibers in each stroke.

Exclusive patented design

Each of our products and accessories has an exclusive genuine “Analan” logo, which represents our professional level of service , we specialize in the design and sales of automotive detailing and household cleaning tools.

Read more

How to use

Step 1

Distinguish between the three densities of jagged edges and select the L edge for the initial cleaning. Then use the M and S size edges for a deeper cleaning.

Step 2

Simply sweep the brush over the hair-covered area to take it away, and it works best when there is an angle between the shaver and the flat surface!

Step 3

Even various corner crevices can be cleared of embedded hair by using the anchor hook with silicone blades.

Step 4

When the hairs are swept into a pile, gently collect them with a vacuum cleaner.

Read more

Read more

Pimple Extractor – Professionally designed, this blackhead extractor with professionally anti-slip handle design for better handle control to ensuring every step can be done with exceptional control and precision to avoid damage to the skin. The tools are rust resistant stainless steel and has anti-slip handle.
All the things in a leather case, it is easy to store and carry. Fits conveniently in your bag, purse or bathroom drawer.
One thing you need to learn is how to use it. If you have any question, please contact us.

Professional Facial Care Tools

Professional Beauty Salon Use

JPNK Blackhead Removal Kit was made of 100% 304 Stainless Steel , With different design of shapes. It is professional level to be used at any high end spa for facial treatments.

Customer Reviews

4.6 out of 5 stars

1,033 ratings

4.6 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #15,071 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#14 in Tap Extractors
Date First Available October 10, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $32.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Material
Cr-V Cr-M Cr-M Cr-M Cr-V Cr-V

Drive Size
1/2″ , 1/4″, 3/8″ 1/2″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 1/2″

Style
/ 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 & 12 Point Shallow

Are you tired of the bolts, nuts, and screws are damaged even if stripped, rusted, or frozen? What will you do? Break it loose with a breaker bar and then fitting the new socket by a hammer or a mallet? But this will damage your socket. Thankfully, THINKWORK impact bolt extractor set is around you to help you to continue to work on your project with ease.

Includes 16 pieces of the most used SAE and metric sizes impact bolt extractors.

3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″.

Superior Gripping Power

The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes is designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power. The more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

Organized Storage

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

Each bolt extractor is made of high hardness chrome-molybdenum steel for superior durability and longer life. It will easily extract damaged bolts, nuts, and screws even if they are stripped, rusted, or frozen.
The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes design to bite down to provide maximum gripping power, the more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.
Standard 3/8-inch drive and hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.
18 pieces 3/8 inch drive bolt & nut remover comes with 3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″, hex adapter and knockout pin.
Heavy-duty blow-molded case lets all the extraction sockets stay organized and take your set on the go.

24 MOST POPULAR SIZES:Our auto push retainer Clips including 24 most popular sizes are suitable for BMW Benz Toyota Honda Nissan Subaru Audi Mazda Ford GM Chrysler.4 different kinds tools with 1 Fastener Remover ,great for car audio, door panel, moldings, window trims system installing or removing, it is can solve your problem very quickly.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN：Our auto trim tool set and trim auto clips adopts ergonomic design with super lightweight，easy handheld features which effectively effort saving for various interior and exterior car trimming in the shortest time.This kit in the box and no need to go to a auto parts store to look for different fasteners.
DURABLE MATERIA:The trim removal tools and Half of the auto clips are made of dueable nylon material,it is can use for a long time.Duty construction for durabilitywould not break or crack easily during use.
WIDELY USEFUL:The auto push clips are widely used for door panel, door trim clips, bumper clips,interior accessories and splash shield retainers replacement.All the necessary retainers for exact replacement of old and broken retainer.
100% SATISFACTION:If you are not satisfied with our car body clips and trim removal tools,please contact us,we will try our best to solve your problem.
